sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' const App = _ => { const [ calcState, setCalcState ] = useState({ a: '', b: '', op: '', result: null, isA: false }) calcState.getDigit = event => { calcState.isA ? setCalcState({ ...calcState, b: calcState.b + event.target.id }) : setCalcState({ ...calcState, a: calcState.a + event.target.id }) } calcState.getOp = event => { // event.target.id setCalcState({ ...calcState, op: event.target.id, isA: !calcState.isA }) } calcState.getRes = _ => { switch (calcState.op) { case '+': setCalcState({ ...calcState, result: parseInt(calcState.a) + parseInt(calcState.b) }) break case '-': setCalcState({ ...calcState, result: parseInt(calcState.a) - parseInt(calcState.b) }) break case '*': setCalcState({ ...calcState, result: parseInt(calcState.a) * parseInt(calcState.b) }) break case '/': setCalcState({ ...calcState, result: parseInt(calcState.a) / parseInt(calcState.b) }) break default: break } } return (

{calcState.a} {calcState.op} {calcState.b} {calcState.result ? '= ' + calcState.result : null}

) } export default App
